title: Gastroenterology & Hepatology in India
intro: Advanced digestive and liver care in India with expert gastroenterologists, hepatologists, and state-of-the-art endoscopic facilities. Panacea Medcare connects international patients to leading GI and liver care centers.

liver.title: Liver Disease & Cirrhosis Management
liver.description: Comprehensive liver disease treatment in India includes advanced management of cirrhosis, hepatitis, and liver failure with expert hepatology teams and state-of-the-art facilities.

endoscopy.title: Advanced Endoscopy & Colonoscopy
endoscopy.description: India offers advanced endoscopic procedures including colonoscopy, upper GI endoscopy, and therapeutic endoscopy for diagnosis and treatment of digestive disorders.

ercp.title: ERCP & EUS
ercp.description: Endoscopic Retrograde Cholangiopancreatography (ERCP) and Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS) procedures in India provide precise diagnosis and treatment of pancreatic and biliary diseases.

ibd.title: Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) Treatment
ibd.description: Specialized IBD treatment in India includes management of Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis with advanced medications, biologics, and surgical options when needed.

cancer.title: Gastrointestinal Cancer Surgery
cancer.description: Expert GI cancer surgery in India includes treatment for esophageal, gastric, colorectal, and pancreatic cancers using minimally invasive and robotic techniques.

bariatric.title: Bariatric & Metabolic Surgery
bariatric.description: Bariatric surgery in India helps patients achieve significant weight loss and manage metabolic conditions like type 2 diabetes with high success rates and comprehensive support.

pancreas.title: Pancreatic Disorders Treatment
pancreas.description: Pancreatic disorder treatment in India includes management of pancreatitis, pancreatic tumors, and pancreatic insufficiency with expert gastroenterology and surgical teams.
